text:
Avrios | Full Time | Software Engineering (Frontend, Fullstack, Backend) | ONSITE

Founded in 2015, Avrios makes mobility work for business. We are a rapidly globally growing software startup providing our clients with an intuitive SaaS platform to manage their corporate mobility. With over 700 clients, we are proud to call ourselves one of the fastest growing startups in Switzerland.

About our company: https://techcrunch-com.cdn.ampproject.org/c/s/techcrunch.com...

You can find all positions here: https://avrios.com/en/jobs

If you can't find a suitable position but are experienced in our tech stack (Java, Angular) please do reach out directly. We'll always be hiring for technical roles.

Apply directly or get in touch with me at wouter (at) <company name> (dot) com
